title: Children of Castor
description: In 1982, a computer error detonates America’s nuclear arsenal. Radioactivity falls across the planet. Like the twin stars, Castor and Pollux, Earth becomes the new Castor and America is Pollux. Seven teenagers who went into an underground studio a bop band, come out survivors. The only true children of Castor.
alt1: the band emerges to nuclear fallout
alt4: Romak holds a young boy with one eye
